Sports and Clubs: Organised All India Late Shri Vashishtha Narayan Karwari Memorial Cricket Tournament in which players of international level participated
Social And Cultural Activities: Started as President, Shri Patharchatti Ramlila Committee Audio-Visual techniques in its stage performances; and construction of Historical Navgrah Temple in the premises of Committee
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Organising of biggest cattle fare of the zone in the village Tawan of district Kaushambi alongwith of programmes like Nautanki wrestling and folk art for the entertainment of rural people
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Organising Shri Ram Rajyabhishek Programme under Shri Patharchatti Ramlila Committee a group of well-known artists every Year, on the occassion of Ram Navmi
Special Interests: Promotion of National and regional sports
Educational Qualifications: B.A., LL.B. Educated at Allahabad University and Lucknow University, Uttar Pradesh
